0.instructions:
Coffee-punch

Start with a beaker containing a coin. Add coffee until the coin is no longer visible. Add akvavit until the coin is visible again.
0.gpt3_output:
<XDL>
  <Synthesis>  
      <Hardware>
          <Vessel id="beaker" />
      </Hardware>
  
      <Reagents>
          <Reagent name="coffee" />
          <Reagent name="akvavit" />
          <Reagent name="sugar" />
          <Reagent name="lime juice" />
      </Reagents>
  
      <Procedure>
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="coffee" />
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="akvavit" />
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="sugar" />
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="lime juice" />
          <StartStir vessel="beaker" />
          <Stir vessel="beaker" time="5" />
          <StopStir vessel="beaker" />
      </Procedure>
  </Synthesis>
</XDL>

1.instructions:
Coffee-punch

Start with a beaker containing a coin. Add coffee until the coin is no longer visible. Add akvavit until the coin is visible again. 
<XDL>
  <Synthesis>  
      <Hardware>
          <Vessel id="beaker" />
      </Hardware>
  
      <Reagents>
          <Reagent name="coffee" />
          <Reagent name="akvavit" />
          <Reagent name="sugar" />
          <Reagent name="lime juice" />
      </Reagents>
  
      <Procedure>
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="coffee" />
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="akvavit" />
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="sugar" />
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="lime juice" />
          <StartStir vessel="beaker" />
          <Stir vessel="beaker" time="5" />
          <StopStir vessel="beaker" />
      </Procedure>
  </Synthesis>
</XDL>
This XDL was not correct. These were the errors
The Hardware section should only contain Component tags
beaker is not defined in Hardware
Please fix the errors.
